fields.bio:
BIRTH PLACE
Ukraine, Kryvyi Rih

EDUCATION
2009-2011 
•Qualification: Master/Thesis: Microsatellite Robust Stabilization System

2009 July: Internship in Antonov Company

2005-2009 National Technical University of Ukraine “KPI”, Department of Aircraft Control Devices and Systems
•Specialty: Aircraft Control Systems
•Qualification: Bachelor/Thesis: Microsatellite Robust Control System

ADDITIONAL EDUCATION
20-27.03.2010 – Training at BEST «BeRICHER9» (leadership, project management, virtual communication, teamwork, time-management) in Gdansk, Poland

7-19.07.2009 – Educational mechatronic courses  devoted to creation of rapid prototyping system using LEGO Mindstorm components  in the Technical University of Cluj-Napoca, Romania

29-30.05.2009 – Participation at the international educational workshop «Intelligence, integration, reliability» in  the Warsaw University of Technology with presentation «Synthesis of the Microsatellite Robust Control System for pitch channel»

2007-2008 – English language courses IAESTE (The International Association For The Exchange Of Students) in NTUU «KPI» 

EXPERIENCE
20.03.2012-19.04.2013   –   position  of software engineer in Samsung Ukraine R&D Center

13.04.2011-16.03.2012 – position of design-engineer in laboratory of laser gyroscopes development, Special Device Poduction State Enterprise «Arsenal»
